name: SteamWorld Collection
overview: Two Action-Packed Games in One Box! SteamWorld Heist & The Outsider DLC Command a steam-driven space pirate crew in this turn-based strategy game with epic tactical shootouts. Customise your recruits and aim their guns for insane skill shots and bullet-bouncing action. SteamWorld Dig In this platform mining adventure, dig your way through the old earth, gaining riches while unearthing an ancient threat that lurks below...
